arts.ttl: James Maddison makes honest admission about Tottenham's mentality as Ange Postecoglou's side surrender two-goal lead in defeat by Brighton
arts.sum: Tottenham, remarkably, ended up losing 3-2 as Yankuba Minteh, Georginio Rutter and Danny Welbeck scored for Brighton.

arts.ttl: Tottenham extend unwanted record after second half capitulation against Brighton as Ange Postecoglou's side throw away 2-0 lead at the Amex
arts.sum: Tottenham fell apart in the second period and Brighton took full advantage as they won the game in dramatic fashion.

arts.ttl: Spurs player ratings vs Brighton - Udogie and Romero poor after first half lead
arts.sum: Tottenham opened the scoring within 24 minutes when James Maddison won a ball back in the Brighton half, fed Dominic Solanke and the striker played a perfect ball through to Johnson, who finished expertly with a first-time finish to make it six goals in as many games. Brighton grabbed a goal back early in the second half through some messy Spurs defending.

arts.ttl: 'Touch sticks to him' - Danny Welbeck reveals personal nickname for Brighton's new silky star
arts.sum: Brighton veteran striker Danny Welbeck has revealed the nickname he has given one of his new teammates after they both scored in a superb 3-2 win over Tottenham.

arts.ttl: Dimitar Berbatov is left 'lost for words' after Tottenham's second-half capitulation - as former striker insists 3-2 defeat was simply 'not Spurs'
arts.sum: Dimitar Berbatov has shared his disbelief at Spurs' second-half capitulation at Brighton, as Ange Postecoglou's men threw away a 2-0 lead to lose to the hosts 3-2.

arts.ttl: Furious Ange Postecoglou labels ‘unacceptable’ Tottenham collapse at Brighton as ‘worst defeat’
arts.sum: Spurs had been in control at 2-0 up at the interval before an extraordinary Brighton comeback

arts.ttl: Brighton 3-2 Tottenham PLAYER RATINGS: Who was the 'worst player on the pitch in the first half but turned the game on its head in the second'? Who was 'such a delight to watch'? And who had 'a day to forget'?
arts.sum: AADAM PATEL AT THE AMEX: Welbeck always offered a threat and should have scored in the first half but missed a sitter. Never stopped though and was in the right position to head in the winner.

arts.ttl: 'We have to improve' - Fabian Hurzeler isn't getting carried away after sensational comeback against Tottenham
arts.sum: Fabian Hurzeler said Brighton ‘deserved to win’ against Tottenham – but he wants to see a number of improvements from his team.

arts.ttl: Brighton rub salt into Tottenham wounds with brutal James Maddison jibe
arts.sum: James Maddison scored at Brighton on Sunday after Brennan Johnson’s opener but Tottenham somehow collapsed to lose 3-2 in a baffling display on the South Coast

arts.ttl: 'In the second half': Sky Sports presenter shares damning Dominic Solanke stat as Tottenham lose at Brighton
arts.sum: Tottenham were beaten at Brighton today and while Dominic Solanke enjoyed a fine first half, the second 45 minutes couldn’t have been more different. Spurs...
